START_DESC: MyInsurBox is Your tool to use Big Data to uncover sales opportunity!

LOGIN.ERROR_GENERAL: Please enter a valid registration ID and password

WELCOME.TITLE: Welcome to MyInsurBox
WELCOME.BODY: Powered by proprietary AI technology, Myinsurbox provides you a powerful but affordable tool to understand and analyse Big Data that will help you generate new business opportunities

PASSWORD_RESET.RESET_LABEL: Please enter your registration ID and email

GROUP_RESERVATION.TITLE: Make an appointment
GROUP_RESERVATION.BODY: If you would like to subscribe Group Purchase service, please let us know the best time for our MyInsurBox’s business representative to contact you within the next 2 working days.
GROUP_RESERVATION.ERROR_MOBILE: Please enter a valid mobile phone number

PAYMENT.POINT_5: One Stop Shop on Insurance Product Information

APPOINTMENT.TITLE: Make an appointment
APPOINTMENT.BODY:
We are setting up your personal MyInsurBox device and service subscription.
Please let us know the best time to contact you within the next 2 working days.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Thank you for registration our service.
CONFIRM.BODY: Thanks for your subscription, our customer representative will contact you soon for final confirmation
CONFIRM.EMAIL_SENT_INFO: We have sent you an email confirmation for the MyInsurBox reservation.Please contact our customer service team through the following means for any question.
CONFIRM.SENT_EMAIL: Resent email. Please allow up to 5 mins.

PROCESSING.TITLE: Your MyInsurBox is on the way
PROCESSING.BODY:
Our support will contact you within
2 working days.
